p: Cantharidin, which is by blister beetles as a chemical defense against predators, is a toxic monoterpene. It is one of the first pharmacological natural products used by humans. The dried body of Mylabris ( Mylabris phalerata and M. cichorii), the Chinese blister beetle, has been used in Chinese medicine for thousands of years to treat malignant tumors such as hepatoma, breast cancer and colorectal cancer.
